Fuse-ext2 is a EXT2 Filesystem support for FUSE.
Dependencies ------------
Fuse-ext2 requires at least Fuse version 2.6.0
- Linux: Fuse from http://fuse.sourceforge.net/
- Mac OS: Mac Fuse from http://code.google.com/p/macfuse/
Build -----
- Linux: $ ./configure $ make $ sudo make install
You can use checkinstall or some other equivalent tool to generate install package for your distribution.
- Mac OS: Standart build: $ ./configure $ make $ sudo make install
Universal build: $ CFLAGS="-arch i386 -arch ppc" ../configure --disable-dependency-tracking $ make $ sudo make install
Generating package: $ make package
Alper Akcan
